amendment.description: An amendment numbered 77 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funding from this Act to carry out the Department of Homeland Security's memo titled "Guidelines for Enforcement Actions in or Near Protected Areas".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.
